"""Console script for decomnano."""
import sys
import click
from .decomnano import DecomNano
from .sweep import SweepDecomNano
import toml


@click.command()
@click.option(
    "-s",
    "--sweep",
    type=bool,
    default=False,
    required=False,
    help="Sweep over a range of values.",
)
@click.option(
    "-c",
    "--config",
    type=str,
    default=None,
    required=None,
    help="Path to config file.",
)
@click.option(
    "-o",
    "--output",
    type=str,
    default="result.csv",
    required=False,
    help="Path to output file.",
)
def run_sweep(config=None):
    pass

[docs]def main(sweep=False, config=None, output=None):
    """Console script for DecomNano.\n
    DecomNano is a heterogeneity analysis of bimetallic nanoparticles using coordination numbers obtained from XAS analysis.\n
    """

    config = toml.load(config)

    print(config)

    #     run_sweep(config)

    return 0



if __name__ == "__main__":
    sys.exit(main())  # pragma: no cover
